welcome_message_body: "Welcome to City Bell, Argentina! Get ready to immerse yourself in the charm of our city, known for its rich history and beautiful scenery. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that City Bell has to offer!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights within Argentina.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights to and from other countries.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ezeiza Ministro Pistarini Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Ezeiza Ministro Pistarini Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited bandwidth.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The secondary terminal for domestic and regional flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free.
